statusDetails.message:
1 expectation failed.
Expected status code <200> but was <409>.

On fail message: 
Request method:	POST
Request URI:	http://localhost:8080/api/metadata/?async=false&importReportMode=FULL&importStrategy=CREATE_AND_UPDATE
Body:

HTTP/1.1 409 Conflict
Content-Security-Policy: frame-ancestors 'self';
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Server: Jetty(10.0.19)

{
    "httpStatus": "Conflict",
    "httpStatusCode": 409,
    "status": "ERROR",
    "message": "org.hibernate.PersistentObjectException: detached entity passed to persist: org.hisp.dhis.period.RelativePeriods"
}
